name: Vesta
summary: Complete all 36 levels in the game, fight a variety of robots, and manage the little energy that keeps the whole thing going. You will have to trust your abilities and solve a series of puzzles if you have any chance of reaching the end of the maze!
info:
• 中文名: 维斯塔
